title: GSoC 2025
snippet: Thanks to MDAnalysis organization for accepting my proposal for GSoC 2025. I will be working on the Better interfacing of Blender and MDAnalysis project this summer under the mentorship of Yuxuan Z...
content: Thanks to MDAnalysis organization for accepting my proposal for GSoC 2025. I will be working on the Better interfacing of Blender and MDAnalysis project this summer under the mentorship of Yuxuan Zhuang and Brady Johnston.I will be posting updates of my GSoC 2025 progress here.
